description.value:
Your animal forms become hardier. You gain [[/heal @level temp]]{temporary Stamina equal to your level} when you enter an animal form in combat, which is added to any temporary Stamina provided by the animal form.

Additionally, an adjacent ally can use a maneuver to pet you. If they do so, you can lose temporary Stamina down to a minimum of 0. The ally gains temporary Stamina equal to the amount you lost.
